verses.verse: And in that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> thou shalt say, <S%H559><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> I will praise <S%H3034><s%> thee: though <S%H3588><s%> thou wast angry <S%H599><s%> with me, thine anger <S%H639><s%> is turned away, <S%H7725><s%> and thou comfortedst <S%H5162><s%> me.

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> God <S%H410><s%> is my salvation; <S%H3444><s%> I will trust, <S%H982><s%> and not <S%H3808><s%> be afraid: <S%H6342><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3050><s%> JEHOVAH <S%H3068><s%> is my strength <S%H5797><s%> and my song; <S%H2176><s%> he also is become <S%H1961><s%> my salvation. <S%H3444><s%>
Therefore with joy <S%H8342><s%> shall ye draw <S%H7579><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> out of the wells <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4599><s%> of salvation. <S%H3444><s%>

And in that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall ye say, <S%H559><s%> Praise <S%H3034><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> upon his name, <S%H8034><s%> declare <S%H3045><s%> his doings <S%H5949><s%> among the people, <S%H5971><s%> make mention <S%H2142><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> is exalted. <S%H7682><s%>

Sing <S%H2167><s%> unto the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> he hath done <S%H6213><s%> excellent things: <S%H1348><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> is known <S%H3045><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

Cry out <S%H6670><s%> and shout, <S%H7442><s%> thou inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of Zion: <S%H6726><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> is the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thee.
